cheats.description: Example: Add custom button on refresh
cheats.code: frappe.ui.form.on('ToDo', { refresh(frm) { if (frm.doc.reference_type && frm.doc.reference_name) { frm.add_custom_button(frm.doc.reference_name, () => { frappe.set_route('Form', frm.doc.reference_type, frm.doc.reference_name); }); } } })
frappe.ui.form.on('Quotation Item', { item_code(frm, cdt, cdn) { let row = frappe.get_doc(cdt, cdn); } })
